chapter.title: Quick Start SCIRun Installation
chapter.subtitle: (UNIX version - Updated June 22, 2001)

sect1.para: This document is a quick installation checklist. See the next chapter SCIRun Installation and Build Instructions for more details.

chapter.sect1:
Minimum System Software Requirements
SCIRun is officially compatible with two platforms: SGI and Linux.
Refer to the chapter Third Party Software Installation and Build Information for information on installing the required software listed below.
&requirements;

orderedlist.listitem: Obtain the source trees for SCIRun and any desired packages.
Unzip the SCIRun source tree into a directory of your choosing.
Ensure that the target install machine matches the above system requirements.
Run configure from a directory of your choosing. The chosen directory will be referred to as BUILD_DIR from now on.
Run GNU make in the BUILD_DIR directory.
